Package software.leonov.common.io

Class URLResources

  • java.lang.Object
    • software.leonov.common.io.URLResources
  • public final class URLResources
extends Object
    Static utility methods for working with resources on the classpath.

    Note: Despite accepting URL parameters methods in this class are not appropriate for non-classpath resources.

    Author:
    Zhenya Leonov

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static String read​(URL resource)
      Reads all characters from a URL into a String using the UTF-8 charset.
      static List<String> readLines​(URL resource)
      Reads all the lines from a URL into a List<String> using the UTF-8 charset.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • read

        public static String read​(URL resource)
                   throws IOException
        Reads all characters from a URL into a String using the UTF-8 charset.

        Guava equivalent: Resources.toString(URL, Charsets.UTF_8).

        Parameters:
        resource - the URL to read from
        Returns:
        a string containing all the characters from the URL
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs

      • readLines

        public static List<String> readLines​(URL resource)
                              throws IOException
        Reads all the lines from a URL into a List<String> using the UTF-8 charset. The lines do not includeline-termination characters, but do include other leading and trailing whitespace.

        Guava equivalent: Resources.readLines(URL, Charsets.UTF_8).

        Parameters:
        resource - the URL to read from
        Returns:
        a mutable List containing all the lines read from the URL
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs
